text: would you be willing to donate to save the children
Yes i would! $1.00 children are the future
That sounds great.  Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment.
Glad i could be of help!
Do you usually donate to these causes
Yes, I believe in working to help others. I come from a very traditional family and was taught to always help others
Thats great.  Every little bit helps.  Save the children is a great fund.
Do you have more detail about the cause you can share?
Sure,  They are a international non governmental organization that promotes children's rights
Non governmental is even better in my opinion
They also provide relief and  and support children in developing countries
Thats great! I have very close family in parts of the world that are less fortunate, my goal is to travel and help in anyway i can
Oh that sounds great any chance I get you to double your donation.  Children are the future
sure Ill donate up to $1.50!
That is so amazing!  This will help so much. Where is your family from?

Glad to help! My family originated in India, then migrated to East Africa and then to the US, I was fortunate to be born in the US however, My family keeps us very humble by sharing their stories and experiences
Oh thats great well this money will go to help with Health education and safety for a child.
Well im glad to have been apart, even if its just a little- hopefully it adds up!
It does.  Thanks again for the 1:50 and it will be deducted from your task payment.
Sounds good, This is my first time taking part in this so I wasn't quite sure how it works
